title: Event Recommendation System
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to recommend local events and social activities based on my interests so that I can stay connected with my community and reduce feelings of isolation.

title: Social Engagement Notifications
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive personalized notifications about local events and social activities so that I can stay connected with my community and reduce feelings of isolation.

title: Family and Caregiver Communication Support
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily communicate with my family and caregivers through voice commands so that I can stay connected and feel supported without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: User-Friendly Event Scheduling
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive personalized event suggestions and easily schedule them using voice commands so that I can stay socially connected and engaged without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Virtual Social Activity Integration
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest local social events and activities based on my interests so that I can stay connected with my community and reduce feelings of isolation.

title: Personalized Event Recommendations
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest local events and activities tailored to my interests so that I can stay socially connected and engaged without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Feedback Mechanism for Social Activities
summary: As an older adult, I want to provide feedback on social activities recommended by ALFRED so that I can help improve the suggestions and engage in activities that truly interest me.

title: Group Communication Support
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily initiate group video calls with my family and friends using voice commands, so that I can stay socially connected and feel less isolated.

title: Interest-Based Community Recommendations
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest local events and activities that match my interests, so that I can stay socially connected and engaged with my community.
